querystring.select: SELECT RCM.CUST_MODEL_NAME AS CustModelName, ACPJD.IS_MF_EMP AS IsMfEmp, ACPJD.COMPANY_NAME AS CompanyName, RMCS.DESCR AS CompanyScaleName, RMJP.DESCR AS JobPositionName, ACPJD.NUM_OF_EMPLOYEE AS NumOfEmp, ACPJD.MR_JOB_TITLE_CODE AS JobTitleName, RMJS.DESCR AS JobStatName, RP.PROFESSION_NAME AS ProfessionName, RIT.INDUSTRY_TYPE_NAME AS IndustryTypeName,ACPJD.ESTABLISHMENT_DT AS EstablishmentDt, ACA.ADDR + ' ' + ACA.AREA_CODE_3 + ' ' + ACA.AREA_CODE_4 + ' ' + ACA.AREA_CODE_1 + ' ' + ACA.AREA_CODE_2 + ' ' + ACA.CITY + ' ' + ACA.ZIPCODE AS JobAddr
querystring.from: FROM dbo.APP_CUST AC WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.APP_CUST_PERSONAL ACP WITH(NOLOCK) ON AC.APP_CUST_ID = ACP.APP_CUST_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.APP_CUST_PERSONAL_JOB_DATA ACPJD WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACP.APP_CUST_PERSONAL_ID = ACPJD.APP_CUST_PERSONAL_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_CUST_MODEL RCM WITH(NOLOCK) ON AC.CUST_MODEL_CODE = RCM.CUST_MODEL_CODE LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_PROFESSION RP WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACPJD.MR_PROFESSION_CODE = RP.PROFESSION_CODE LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_INDUSTRY_TYPE RIT WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACPJD.INDUSTRY_TYPE_CODE = RIT.INDUSTRY_TYPE_CODE LEFT JOIN dbo.APP_CUST_ADDR ACA WITH(NOLOCK) ON AC.APP_CUST_ID = ACA.APP_CUST_ID AND ACA.MR_CUST_ADDR_TYPE_CODE = 'JOB' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER RMCS WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACPJD.MR_COMPANY_SCALE_CODE = RMCS.MASTER_CODE AND RMCS.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'COY_SCALE' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER RMJP WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACPJD.MR_JOB_POSITION_CODE = RMJP.MASTER_CODE AND RMJP.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'JOB_POSITION' LEFT JOIN dbo.V_REF_MASTER RMJS WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACPJD.MR_JOB_STAT_CODE = RMJS.MASTER_CODE AND RMJS.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'JOB_STAT'
